General.Name: Coca-Cola Icecek AS
General.Description: Coca-Cola Içecek Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a bottler and distributor of alcohol-free beverages in Turkey, Pakistan, Central Asia, and the Middle East. The company engages in the production, distribution, and sale of sparkling and still beverages under the Coca-Cola, Coca-Cola Zero, Coca-Cola Zero Sugar, Coca-Cola Light, Fanta, Sprite, Cappy, Sen Sun, Powerade, Monster, Burn, Gladiator, Fuse tea, Damla, Damla Minera, and Costa Coffee, as well as Schweppes brands. It also offers water, juice, sports and energy drinks, and tea and iced tea, as well as sparkling beverages. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: OSB Mahallesi Deniz Feneri Sokak No: 4, Istanbul, Turkey, 34776
